div.p: The file to import must contain the following columns with these names:

ul.li: product_tmpl_code: product template's internal reference. This field is required. If it does not exist it will be created.

attribute: attribute_name It will only be completed if the product has variants. The file will have a column for each attribute. Each column contains "attribute:" followed by the corresponding attribute name. The value of each attribute will be entered in the corresponding row.

div.p: If you wish you can add fields setting the name of the field as the column name. To see the name of the fields you must activate developer mode from the Settings/Activate developer mode menu.
